mapper.select: SELECT d.purchasePrice, d.QTY, d.totalPrice, d.supplyPrice, d.VAT , g.goodsName, g.taxType, g.weight FROM tb_orderDetail AS d INNER JOIN tb_goods AS g ON d.barcode = g.barcode WHERE d.orderCode = #{orderCode}

SELECT o.orderNum, DATE(o.purchaseDate) AS purchaseDate, o.totalOrderPrice , o.ID, u.name , o.businessCode, b.businessName, b.registerNum, b.partnerName, b.callNum, b.sectors, b.address FROM tb_order AS o INNER JOIN tb_business AS b ON o.businessCode = b.businessCode INNER JOIN tb_user AS u ON o.ID = u.ID WHERE o.orderCode = #{orderCode}

SELECT o.orderCode, o.businessCode, o.orderNum, o.deliveryDate, o.state, o.purchaseDate, o.martCode, o.id, o.regDate, o.totalOrderPrice, b.businessName, o.ID, u.name FROM tb_order AS o INNER JOIN tb_business AS b ON o.businessCode = b.businessCode INNER JOIN tb_user AS u ON o.ID = u.ID WHERE o.state = "승인" ORDER BY o.orderNum ASC

SELECT o.orderCode, o.businessCode, o.orderNum, o.deliveryDate, o.state, o.purchaseDate, o.martCode, o.id, o.regDate, b.businessName FROM tb_order AS o INNER JOIN tb_business AS b ON o.businessCode = b.businessCode
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_order( orderCode, businessCode, orderNum, deliveryDate, state, purchaseDate, martCode, ID, totalOrderPrice, regDate )VALUES ( #{orderCode}, #{businessCode}, #{orderNum}, #{deliveryDate}, #{state}, #{purchaseDate}, #{martCode}, #{ID}, #{totalOrderPrice}, NOW() );
